name: Neo Ninja
description:
Distal Studios Submission for the Bullet Hell Jam 2021. The theme was 10 seconds, and while he planned to use this theme we were unable to in the time we had.

Slash, Dash, and Shoot across 4 unique levels in this ninja-themed bullet hell.

Controls:
WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Space - Dash

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Slash

ESC - Leave level.

CREDITS:

@epicsninja - Programming
